title: Drawing, "Poster Design:  Abstract Bird on Blue Ground, study for poster, "Quickest Way by Airmail", 1935
medium: Brush and black ink, blue gouache, graphite on heavy white tracing paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: An angular, abstract rendering of a bird in flight (recalling a paper airplane) surrounded by blue sky.  The body is solid black with white circular eye and white triangular beak.  The upper wing is formed by an elongated white triangle; the lower wing formed by a smaller elongated white triangle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Poster Design:  Abstract Bird on Blue Ground, study for poster, "Quickest Way by Airmail", 1935.
1935. Brush and black ink, blue gouache, graphite on heavy white tracing paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-899.
